mapper.select: select * from review order by no desc and use_state='o'
select * from review where no=(select min(no) from review where no>#{no}) and use_state='o'
select * from review where no=(select max(no) from review where no<#{no}) and use_state='o'
mapper.update: update review set writer=#{writer}, regdate=#{regdate}, cnt=#{cnt}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, use_state=#{use_state} where no=#{no}
update review set cnt=cnt+1 where no=#{no}
update review set useState=#{use_state} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select * from review where use_state='o' order by no desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}
select * from review where no>0 order by no desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}
select count(no) from review where use_state='o'
